Translations.Text: Sapata suryara arau tara poharara
sapata candrara yetiya i suryara pichata abirbhara haya
dinara sapata yetiya suryaka prakasa karae
raatira sapata yetiya i suryaka acchadita karae
sapata akasara arau se'i sattara yijane iyaka nirmana karaiche
prthiraira sapata arau yijane iyaka bistrta karaiche
sapata naphachara arau yijane iyaka subin'yasta karaiche
tara pichata iyaka tara satkamara arau asatkamara jnana dana karaiche
nisandehe siye'i saphala haiche yiye nijake paraitra karaiche
Arau siye'i byartha haiche, yiye nijake kalusita karaiche
Chamuda sampradaye abadhyatabasata asbikara karaichila
Yetiya sihamtara majara hatabhagya byaktijana tatpara hai uthila
tetiya allahara raachule sihamtaka ka'le, 'allahara utajanika arau ta'ira pani khoraa samparke saradhana horaa
Kintu sihamte asbikara karaile arau utajanika badha karaile. Phalata sihamtara papara babe sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka samule dhbansa karai ekakara karai dile
Arau te'om iyara parainamaka bhaya nakarae
Sapata raatira, yetiya i acchanna karae
sapata dinara, yetiya i ujjbala haya
arau sapata se'i sattara, yijane nara arau narai srsti karaiche
Niscaya tomalokara karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira
Eteke konoba'i dana karaile arau takbaraa aralambana karaile
arau yi uttama taka satya buli grahana karaile
ami tara babe sahaja pathata cala sugama karai dima
Arau konoba'i krpanali karaile arau nijake amukhapeksi bhabile
arau yi uttama taka asbikara karaile
ami tara babe kathina pathata cala sugama karai dima
Arau tara sampada tara kono kamata nahiba, yetiya si dhbansa haâ€™ba
Niscaya pathapradarsana karaatorae amara kartabya
Niscaya amiye'i parakala arau ihakalara malika
Eteke ami tomalokaka lelihana ju'i samparke satarka karai dicho
